title: Ep. - 399 - MIA THORNTON FROM REAL HOUSEWIVES OF POTOMAC
description:
Kate discusses Buried on Showtime, Nuclear Family on HBO, and 15 Minutes of Shame on HBO Max.

 

Mia Thornton is a new cast member on Bravo’s Real Housewives of Potomac this season. She discusses how she was cast, her relationship with her mother, her rift with Candiace, and the true story of how she met her husband Gordon.

 


Reality Life with Kate Casey

Patreon: http://www.patreon.com/katecasey
